about_the_game:
A great magician never reveals her secrets, but the rest of the circus has plenty to share. This Art book features over one hundred pages of Death Trick: Double Blind concept art, including everything from the beautiful backgrounds and enigmatic cast to the stylized UI and the CGs that are a must-have in any adventure game.

Alongside the art pieces are commentary from the developers: Jenny (our artist), Mari, (our writer), and Kala (our composer), to give you detailed breakdowns on everything from the sounds used for a character’s theme song to how the game systems have changed between the prototype and the final release. It’s every secret in Death Trick: Double Blind fully unveiled, with even some bonus answers for questions you didn’t know you had.

But beware of spoilers now! This book is best left for after you’ve solved the mystery itself!
